description: Structured information describing an anatomical entity (term).

otherAnatomicalRelations.instruction: Add one or several anatomical entity relation(s) that describe the relation of this anatomical entity to another one.

nameOfLocation.instruction: Enter the name of the anatomical entity.

parentStructure.instruction: Add another anatomical entity to which this anatomical entity is part of.

relatedOntology.instruction: Enter the identifier (IRI) of the related ontological term that best describes this anatomical entity.
